org.kiji.schema.impl
Class BoundColumnReaderSpec

java.lang.Object
  org.kiji.schema.impl.BoundColumnReaderSpec

@ApiAudience.Private
@ApiStability.Experimental
public final class BoundColumnReaderSpec
extends Object

Binding of a ColumnReaderSpec to a specific column. The table in which the column can be found is assumed based on the context in which the BoundColumnReaderSpec is used.

Method Detail

create

public static BoundColumnReaderSpec create(ColumnReaderSpec columnReaderSpec,
                                           KijiColumnName column)
                                    throws NoSuchColumnException
Bind a ColumnReaderSpec to the given column in the given table. This binding does not modify the ColumnReaderSpec, nor prevent it from being bound to other columns simultaneously.

Parameters:
columnReaderSpec - the ColumnReaderSpec to bind.
column - column to which to bind the ColumnReaderSpec.
Returns:
a new BoundColumnReaderSpec.
Throws:
NoSuchColumnException - in case the given column does not exist in the layout.

getColumnReaderSpec

public ColumnReaderSpec getColumnReaderSpec()
Get the ColumnReaderSpec which is bound to the given column.

Returns:
the ColumnReaderSpec which is bound to the given column.
